pros: If you're interested in working in the rare book trade its great networking. They produce one major book fair at internationally renowned gallery in London so that's not bad.
cons: As a member of an awkward two-person team it's pretty much a two-person show and you won't be the second person. Prepare for impromptu reviews and last minute decisions you won't be party to. Expect micromanagement and no significant authority in your role despite what the job description says. Amateur behaviour at every level, including opinions on your personal life and an approach to communication last seen in the 1970s.
